name: Jack The Jumpy Skateboard Kid - Red cap boy escape game with 8-bit graphics
name_original: Jack The Jumpy Skateboard Kid - Red cap boy escape game with 8-bit graphics
description:
The amazing Skateboard Kid has come to your iOS devices. This game is very challenging and fun. A great game to compete with your friends.

How to play:
- Hold the screen to jump.
- The longer you hold, the higher the kid jump.
- Avoid the obstacles
- Try to get higher score than your friends
